How many people are affected by Carpenter syndrome ?,Carpenter syndrome is thought to be a rare condition; approximately 70 cases have been described in the scientific literature.,GHR,Carpenter syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Carpenter syndrome ?,"Mutations in the RAB23 or MEGF8 gene cause Carpenter syndrome.
